ReferenceData.String: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <!DOCTYPE ForceField.dtd PUBLIC "ForceField.dtd" "ForceField.dtd"> <ForceField> <AtomTypes> <Type name="s3_1" class="s3_b" element="S" mass="32.065"/> <Type name="o2_1" class="o2_b" element="O" mass="15.9994"/> <Type name="o2_2" class="o2_b" element="O" mass="15.9994"/> <Type name="o2_3" class="o2_b" element="O" mass="15.9994"/> <Type name="o2_4" class="o2_b" element="O" mass="15.9994"/> </AtomTypes> <Residues> <Residue name="sulfate"> <Atom name="S_1" type="s3_1" charge="-0.25274661365632"/> <Atom name="O_2" type="o2_1" charge="-0.43681071251183"/> <Atom name="O_3" type="o2_2" charge="-0.43680835857378"/> <Atom name="O_4" type="o2_3" charge="-0.43682033742576"/> <Atom name="O_5" type="o2_4" charge="-0.43681397783231"/> <Bond atomName1="S_1" atomName2="O_4"/> <Bond atomName1="S_1" atomName2="O_3"/> <Bond atomName1="O_2" atomName2="S_1"/> <Bond atomName1="O_5" atomName2="S_1"/> </Residue> </Residues> <HarmonicBondForce> <Bond class1="o2_b" class2="s3_b" k="300000" length="0.1399"/> </HarmonicBondForce> <HarmonicAngleForce energy="0"> <Angle class1="o2_b" class2="s3_b" class3="o2_b" k="300" angle="1.9949113350295"/> </HarmonicAngleForce> <CustomAngleForce energy="0"/> <PeriodicTorsionForce energy="0"/> <PeriodicTorsionForce energy="0"/> <CustomNonbondedForce energy="0" bondCutoff="0"> <GlobalParameter name="pot-LJ12_6" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="pot-COULOMB_GAUSSIAN" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="cr-epsilon_Geometric" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="cr-sigma_Geometric" defaultValue="1"/> <UseAttributeFromResidue name="charge"/> <PerParticleParameter name="sigma"/> <PerParticleParameter name="epsilon"/> <PerParticleParameter name="charge"/> <PerParticleParameter name="zeta"/> </CustomNonbondedForce> <NonbondedForce coulomb14scale="1" lj14scale="1"> <UseAttributeFromResidue name="charge"/> </NonbondedForce> </ForceField>
